Summary: At 5am i witnessed an upside down teardrop shaped object flashing multiple coloured lights and changing flight direction several times before zooming away.
divs: sighting detailsi got up to use the restroom at 5a. it was still pretty dark out and upon climbing back into bed, i stared out my window into the sky and saw what appeared to be a very bright, multi-coloured star. i stared at it for about 5 seconds and quickly realized this "star" was moving slowly through the sky, flashing blue, red and white. jolted out of my sleepiness i grabbed my binoculars and began following the flashy object's otherworldly path. during the 10 minutes or so that i watched it i observed this upside-down teardrop-shaped object change flight direction several times, up then down, backward-forward, dimming, brightening and flashing its blue, red and white lights. eventually it flew out of my sight, disappearing behind some trees. i could still see the flickering of its lights but i had seen enough. all in all it was pretty eerie. the "ufo" was really high up, approx. 1\2-1 mile in the sky. it was definitely not any kind of airplane, helicopter or satellite. this thing was weird. i gotta say, i'm not usually into all the hype of this "fire in the sky" stuff. i don't read ufo stalker or dvr 'i know what i saw'. i don't smoke pot or do hallucinogens (this year) so i know i witnessed something crazy. i should add, once i laid back down i looked up in the sky through the window on the other side of my bed. after gazing through my binoculars for awhile i saw a brightly lit object zoom through the sky at shooting-star speed. unlike a shooting star it never burned out or dimmed, it just kept zooming throughout the twilight. not sure if this is relevant but i live in d-town riverside. okay, the end.
trends: There have been 38 other sightings in Riverside
There were no other sightings in Riverside on or around November 23rd 2012
